name: Image Uploader for Welcart
author: Mizuho Ogino

sections.description:
As the name suggests it will create the metabox with the media uploader for Welcart. It allows user to upload and sort product images directory from each edit page. It would be suitable for a small webshop which is updated manually.
By uploading the image through the uploader, this plugin will rename a file to Welcart format.

Attension

Available only for WordPress 4.0+ and for ‘Welcart e-Commerce‘ plugin.
If using WordPress 4.5.4+, you need to install Welcart 1.9+ and Image Uploader 1.4+.
sections.installation:
1. Copy the ‘image-uploader-for-welcart’ folder into your plugins folder.
  2. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins‘ admin page. It can only be used when the ‘Welcart’ plugin enabled. The plugin requires no setup or modifying core wordpress files.
